2005350.name: Elohim Eternal - Prologue
2005350.description:
A FREE Prologue to Elohim Eternal: The Babel Code, a turn-based RPG indie title inspired by Xenogears and Shin Megami Tensei. Play as Joshwa as he helps an ex-Judge let go of his past. Battle beasts with mechanical parts using elemental and divine magic.

This Prologue is an introduction to the full game, Elohim Eternal: The Babel Code. It takes place one day before the events of the full game. It will take about 1-2 hours to complete. Playing this Prologue will give you a good taste of what to expect for Elohim Eternal: The Babel Code.
2005350.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
